comments.text: For anyone who’s played both KCD1 & KCD2 what are the pros and cons of each? I’m currently playing KCD1 and whilst enjoying the game it’s a very slow burn, taking awhile to get things going, the controls feel clunky at times and I hate the lack of customization for the controls. Graphics aren’t awful but they also aren’t great by no means. Combat feels pretty terrible imo although I’m still early in the game at about 4 hours.
